sen.j: 三条 公敦（さんじょう きんあつ、永享11年（1439年） - 永正4年4月8日 (旧暦)（1507年5月19日））は、室町時代の公卿。
sen.e: Kinatsu SANJO (1439-May 19, 1507) was Kugyo (the top court official) in the Muromachi period.

sen.e: He served mainly in three generations of the Emperor Gohanazono (the one hundred and second), the Emperor Gotsuchimikado (the one hundred and third) and the Emperor Gokashiwabara (the one hundred and fourth), and promoted up to Juichii (Junior First Rank) Udaijin (minister of the right).

sen.e: After experiencing Sakone no chujo (Middle Captain of the Left Division of Inner Palace Guards), Owari gon no kami (provisional governor of Owari Province), Gon Chunagon (a provisional vice-councilor of state), Gon Dainagon (provisional major counselor) and other positions, he became Ukone no daisho (Major Captain of the Right Division of Inner Palace Guards) in 1466 and Sakone no daisho (Major Captain of the Left Division of Inner Palace Guards) as well as Naidaijin (minister) in 1475.
